issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

When importing the KitchenSink sample the SDK in the tiapp.xml is set to 3.5.0.GA. It should be set to 3.5.1.GA

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Using the latest Studio import KitchenSink from the samples

h5.Actual Result

The SDK version in the tiapp.xml is set to 3.5.0.GA

h5.Expected Result

The SDK version in the tiapp.xml should be set to 3.5.1.GA
fields.summary: KitchenSink: When importing the sample via Studio, tiapp.xml is set to 3.5.0.GA

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
